UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, policies, legislation, and budgeting are based on evidence, including for measures to reduce child deprivations and disparities, are implemented.

sector.narrative: Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: D'ici 2016, le Gouvernement d?Haiti dispose et utilise des donnees et des analyses desagregees aux niveaux national et local surla situation de l'enfant et de la femme, pour une prise de decision basee sur l?evidence et axee sur l?equite.

description.narrative: By 2016, the Government of Haiti possesses and uses data and analyses on the situation of children and women disaggregated at national and local levels for decision making based on evidence and equity | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:15/12/2016

title.narrative: Number of administrative data collection systems supported, which provide high quality, regularly updated and disaggregated data

target.value: 2016:Availability of updated HaitInfo, Database for 3 communes for Kore Fanmi

actual.value: 2016:Databases established only at IHSI and ONPES.Databases established in the three targeted communes of Kore Fanmi, using the SIIS Mobile to feed into the SIIS.

title.narrative: Availability of high quality data from national and sub-national surveys which is disaggregated and equity-based.

baseline.value: EMMUS V conducted at national level, 0 survey at commune level

target.value: 2016:EMMUS VI conducted, socio-economic surveys conducted in 6 communes and updated in 3 communes

actual.value: 2016:EMMUS VI underway.Regular updates of socio-economic surveys as well as map of opportunities in the three targeted by the Kore Fanmi Agents.

title.narrative: Secondary analyses of available data carried out to analyse the situation of children and used for advocacy and prioritisation for reducing child poverty
